Class BasicAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.authentication.Authenticator
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.authentication.BasicAuth

  • public class BasicAuth
extends Authenticator
    BasicAuth implementation of the Authenticator. BasicAuth: "Authorization: Basic [Base64:]username:password"
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    twack

      • parsePost

        protected java.lang.String[] parsePost(java.lang.String post)
                                throws AuthenticationException
        Description copied from class: Authenticator
        Implements encoding-specific POST string parsing logic.
        Specified by:
        parsePost in class Authenticator
        Parameters:
        post - the POST string
        Returns:
        a String array with the user credentials in the format [username, password]
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - for any parsing error, invalid format, etc.

      • isValidBasicAuth

        private boolean isValidBasicAuth(java.lang.String[] authParts)
        Inspects the authString and determines if it is a valid BasicAuth string. Checks if it has all 3 parts, then checks the validity of the parts.
        Parameters:
        authString - the authorization string to be validated
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise.

      • generateBasicAuth

        public static java.lang.String generateBasicAuth(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String pass)
        Static utility for generating a BasicAuth token. Format: "Authorization: Basic " + [Base64Encoded]username:password
        Parameters:
        username -
        pass -
        Returns:
        a String containing a BasicAuth token for the given parameters.
